Package com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline

package com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline
Contains packages that provide implementations used in the construction of the message processing pipeline.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.accessors
    Provides classes that expose a uniform interface for accessing structured data from diverse object types used within MessageBuilderLib.
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.cooldown
    Provides an implementation of a message rate limiter.
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.formatters
    Provides localized formatters for types
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.matchers
    Provides implementation(s) of placeholder matching routines
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.processors
    Provides implementation(s) of a message processor
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.replacers
    Provides implementation(s) of a macro replacer
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.resolvers
    Provides implementations of resolvers for retrieving values for various types
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.retrievers
    Provides implementations of retrievers for values of various types
    com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.adapters.pipeline.senders
    Provides implementations for senders of messages and titles
